title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
Neither point may be earned for a response that does not apply the chain rule. The second point may be earned with a maximum of one error in g ′  ( x ), MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPj MCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaac H8rrps0lbbf9q8WrFfeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFf ea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaa baqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaaceWGNbGbauaacaaMi8+aae WaaeaacaWG4baacaGLOaGaayzkaaGaaiilaaaa@38F2@ unless the error is failing to apply the chain rule. Substitution of function values is required. A simplified answer is not required.

Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples to score the response.
descriptions: The student response does not accurately include any of the criteria below.
The student response accurately includes one of the criteria below.
The student response accurately includes one of the criteria below.

title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
Points may be earned in this part for consistent and correct use of the g ′  ( x ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPj MCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaac H8rrps0lbbf9q8WrFfeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFf ea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaa baqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaaceWGNbGbauaacaaMi8+aae WaaeaacaWG4baacaGLOaGaayzkaaaaaa@3842@ from part (a).

The first and second points require evidence of product rule and chain rule and no errors. At most 1 out of 3 points is earned for partial communication of product rule and chain rule with a maximum of one computational error. Substitution of function values is required. A simplified answer is not required.

Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions: The student response does not accurately include any of the criteria below.
The student response accurately includes one of the criteria below.
The student response accurately includes two of the criteria below.
The student response accurately includes all three of the criteria below.

title: Part C
stimulusHtml:
The second point may be earned if response contains conditions of IVT MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPj MCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaac H8rrps0lbbf9q8WrFfeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFf ea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaa baqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaqGjbGaaeOvaiaabsfaaa a@35B0@ without naming the theorem.

title: Part D
stimulusHtml:
At most 1 out of 2 points is earned for an answer based on an average rate of change with a maximum of one computational error. Substitution of function values is required.

Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
